name: NOAH: The Ark
description:
Made for the 2020 Global Game Jam

After the flood when the water started to lower, the Ark carrying Noah, his family, and all the animals hit a large landmass causing the Ark to be destroyed and the pairs of animals on-board to become mixed up! Yahweh, our LORD, commands you, Noah, to re-pair the animals and sacrifice their offspring onto him in exchange for wood to repair the Ark.

Source code and Unity project available on GitHub 

https://github.com/CurtisVonRubenhoff/Repair
